Html:
On August 2, we posted the Prism v4 CTP - August 2010.  Today, we updated the download, adding links to the API reference docs for both WPF and Prism.  These docs should help with using the new bootstrappers, using MEF as the DI container in your Prism app, and seeing the full public API for Prism.

Note:  You may need to right-click, select properties, and click "Unblock" to actually use the CHM files.

Enjoy,
Michael Puleio
Michael, when is the official release date? Thanks.

The plan of record is September-ish As I stated in my blog post. Since I am no longer on the team, you should follow David Hill's blog for any updates to the plan of record.

Blaine Wastell
